cluster_information.name: Basic Information
cluster_information.description: This cluster provides attributes and events for determining basic information about Nodes, which supports both Commissioning and operational determination of Node characteristics, such as Vendor ID, Product ID and serial number, which apply to the whole Node.

struct_fields.name: CaseSessionsPerFabric
struct_fields.description: This field SHALL indicate the actual minimum number of concurrent CASE sessions that are supported per fabric.

struct_fields.name: SubscriptionsPerFabric
struct_fields.description: This field SHALL indicate the actual minimum number of concurrent subscriptions supported per fabric.

attributes.name: DataModelRevision
attributes.description: The data model revision of the Node

attributes.name: VendorName
attributes.description: The vendor name in human readable text

attributes.name: ProductName
attributes.description: The product name in human readable text

attributes.name: NodeLabel
attributes.description: The Node Label assigned by the user

attributes.name: HardwareVersion
attributes.description: The hardware version of the Node

attributes.name: HardwareVersionString
attributes.description: The hardware version string of the Node

attributes.name: SoftwareVersion
attributes.description: The software version of the Node

attributes.name: SoftwareVersionString
attributes.description: The software version string of the Node

attributes.name: ManufacturingDate
attributes.description: The manufacturing date of the Node

attributes.name: PartNumber
attributes.description: The part number of the Node

attributes.name: ProductURL
attributes.description: The product URL of the Node

attributes.name: ProductLabel
attributes.description: The product label of the Node

attributes.name: SerialNumber
attributes.description: The serial number of the Node

attributes.name: LocalConfigDisabled
attributes.description: Indicates whether local configuration is disabled

attributes.name: Reachable
attributes.description: Indicates whether the Node is reachable

attributes.name: UniqueID
attributes.description: The unique identifier of the Node
